documentation.text:
Creates a channel contract clone EIP 1167
   * @param target           Address to be cloned

params._channelAddress: Channel address that the sig is for
params._sender: The sender address for a channel

params._contract2Clone: Contract address to the ERC20 Channel Template
params._endTime: Time in unix when the channel can be forced closed if recip doesn't close
params._recipient: Address that will recieve the funds when channel is closed
params._tokenAddress: token address of the underlying asset

params._contract2Clone: Contract address to Eth Channel Template
params._endTime: Time in unix when the channel can be forced closed
params._recipient: Address that will recieve the funds when channel is closed

checkSignature(address,address,uint8,uin.notice: Called by channel contracts to verfiy signatures

createERC20Channel(address,address,uint2.notice: Creates a cChannel that only handels Compound supported ERC20 tokens

createEthChannel(address,address,uint256.notice: Creates a cChannel that only handels Ether
